name: Galvan Magen
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can\'t speak
book: Icewind Dale: Rime of the Frostmaiden

traits.Fiery End: If the magen dies, its body disintegrates in a harmless burst of fire and smoke, leaving behind anything it was wearing or carrying.
traits.Magic Resistance: The magen has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
traits.Unusual Nature: The magen doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.
